mapper.select: select A.*,(b.tim_no) as coll_chk from (select timeline.* from collection left join timeline on collection.tim_no = timeline.tim_no where collection.mem_no = #{mem_no}) A left join (select * from collection where mem_no = #{mem_no}) B on a.tim_no = b.tim_no

select A.*,(b.tim_no) as coll_chk from (select A.*,(B.tim_no) as fix_chk from (select * from timeline where pro_no = #{pro_no} order by tim_no desc) A left join topfixture B on A.tim_no = B.tim_no) A left join (select * from collection where mem_no =#{mem_no}) B on a.tim_no = b.tim_no
mapper.delete: delete collection where tim_no=#{tim_no} and mem_no = #{mem_no}
mapper.select: select * from files where cont_kind = 'tim' and cont_no = #{tim_no}
